title: The Supreme Court case that could upend abortion rights
itunes:title: The Supreme Court case that could upend abortion rights
description:
The Supreme Court will hear arguments later this year in a case that could challenge Roe v. Wade. Amy Howe of SCOTUSblog breaks down why the stakes are high for the future of abortion law in America.

The Biden administration will soon begin distributing expanded child-benefit payments to tens of millions of American families. The Washington Post details how the program will work.

Ahead of a much-anticipated government report on UFOs, the New Yorker explains how the issue has gained legitimacy over the past few years, in part thanks to the work of one investigative journalist.

A lack of gender diversity in clinical trials is not only a problem in those involving humans. CNN reveals how it also affects animal experiments.
content:encoded:

Ahead of a much-anticipated government report on UFOs, the New Yorker explains how the issue has gained legitimacy over the past few years, in part thanks to the work of one investigative journalist.

A lack of gender diversity in clinical trials is not only a problem in those involving humans. CNN reveals how it also affects animal experiments.
